subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Two Mavericks team officials confirmed that Dirk Nowitzki, who led the Dallas Mavericks to a 67-victory season, will be named the N.B.A.’s most valuable player.
snippet: Two Mavericks team officials confirmed that Dirk Nowitzki, who led the Dallas Mavericks to a 67-victory season, will be named the N.B.A.’s most valuable player.
